inputs.selection_motivation: UK 30‑year gilt yields move tightly with U.S. 10‑year Treasury yields as global risk‑aversion and relative yield spreads drive both markets.
inputs.candidate_motivation: UK gilt yields are driven by sovereign risk, global yield curve dynamics, and monetary policy. Therefore peers are other long‑term sovereign yields, US Treasury yields, and German/Japanese yields; influences include Fed/ECB policy, inflation data, and currency indices that affect risk sentiment.

proposed_link.motivation: UK 30‑year gilt yields move tightly with U.S. 10‑year Treasury yields as global risk‑aversion and relative yield spreads drive both markets.
